isis.stitle: TSI 94-12-11 - Upper Idler Gear Bolt Torque For DT 408, DT 466 and the International® 530 Engines

subjectgroup.subject: Upper Idler Gear Bolt Torque For DT 408, DT 466 and the International® 530 Engines

svcproc.title: DESCRIPTION:
svcproc.para: The engine upper idler gear mounting bolt torque is changed to 325 Nm (240 lbf - ft) from 359 Nm (265 lbf - ft).
Whenever the upper idler gear is removed a new mounting bolt (P/N 1 820 287 C1) must be used. Be sure to install new bolt into clean and dry crankcase threads.

important.para: NEW BOLT HAS A PRE-APPLIED SEALER.
DO NOT OIL OR ADD ADDITIONAL SEALANT.

svcproc.para: A copy of this service letter should be filed with the engine service manual (Form No. EGES-105 or 105-1) until the manual has been updated to include this change.
